tool_description: PoetryDB is the world's first API for Next Generation internet poets
name: Poetry DB
title: Poetry DB

api_list.name: /title
api_list.description: List of all poem titles on Poetry DB
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://thundercomb-poetry-db-v1.p.rapidapi.com/title"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "thundercomb-poetry-db-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: /title/{title}
api_list.description: All poems on Poetry DB with a specific title

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The title of the poem, or part of the title of the poem.

api_list.code:

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /linecount/{linecount}
api_list.description: All poems on Poetry DB with a specific number of lines

required_parameters.name: linecount
required_parameters.description: The number of lines in a poem.

api_list.name: /author,title/{author};{title}
api_list.description: All poems with a specific title by a specific author

required_parameters.name: author
required_parameters.description: The poet, or part of the poet's name

required_parameters.name: title
required_parameters.description: The title of the poem, or part of the title of the poem.

api_list.name: /author/{author}:abs
api_list.description: All poems by a specific author

required_parameters.name: author
required_parameters.description: The exact name of the poet

        }

print(response.json())
